import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'MailingListWebApp'; protected readonly submitted = submitted; protected readonly toggleSubmitted = toggleSubmitted; } let submitted = false; function toggleSubmitted() { submitted= !submitted; } Mailing List Add me to the mailing list!
